Memberships At Cypress Lake
Each Founder Membership will share in ownership of the Club,
can vote on affairs of the Club and hold elected office.
Cypress Lake Golf Club –  Est 1959
Memberships
Brian Hart, PGA, Membership Director
239-481-1333
419-688-9398
brian@cypresslakegc.com
Golf Memberships:
Equity Golf: Founder Membership
$35,000 stock purchase  –  $12,600 family dues/$8,400
single dues  –  $2,400 capital dues  – $600 food & beverage minimum.
Founder Membership is available to an individual or jointly to a married couple and dependent children under the age of 24. As the nucleus of the Club, each Founder Membership will share in ownership of the Club, can vote on affairs of the Club and hold elected office.
Founder members have year round use of the clubhouse, golf course, practice facilities, tennis facilities and dining rooms.
Sports Memberships:
Sports Membership:   – $2,520 (family) dues / $1,680 (single) dues  –  $600 capital dues  –  $100 food & beverage minimum  No stock certificate purchase.
Sports Membership is available to an individual or jointly to a married couple and dependent children under the age of 24. Sports members have year round use of tennis facilities, clubhouse and dining rooms. The Club extends Sports members summer golf privileges May through October with payment of appropriate fees.
Can be upgraded to a Founder Membership at the then current price, provided a membership is available.
Interested?

This is a summary of the membership opportunities offered by Cypress Lake Golf Club. Every person who desires to purchase a membership in the Club should carefully read the Club Bylaws and Rules and Regulations. The Club reserves the right to modify the membership program and benefits at any time without notice.
Should you have any questions concerning the membership opportunities available at Cypress Lake Golf Club please contact the Membership Office at 6767 Winkler Road, Fort Myers, FL 33919 or by telephone at (239) 481-1333
Please add sales tax to the above dues rates.
This Information is accurate as of June 1st, 2024 and may be changed at any time without notice.

Cypress Lake Golf Club in Fort Myers, FL is a first class golf course for golfers of any level. Beautiful fairways and pristine greens, makes it the perfect golfing choice. Cypress Lake has a thriving membership and  the pro-shop has everything needed to improve your game including a state of the art practice facility, the latest golf equipment and top PGA pros for lessons and guidance.
Call Us

Welcome To Fort Myers Finest ...
Cypress Lake Golf Club
The members of Cypress Lake Golf Club are committed to the enjoyment and preservation of golf and the traditions of the game; to an exceptional an unpretentious golf experience; to leaving our club better then we find it; and to respecting our fellow member’s experience and those devoted to delivering them
Make An Appointment!
Become A Member
Become A Member
Enjoy the benefits of belonging to a high quality golf course and meet new friends and business associates!
Find Out More
View Fly Overs
Watch videos of each hole at Cypress Lake Golf Club from a bird's eye view.
View Course Fly-Overs
Book A Course Tour
Enjoy the benefits of belonging to a high quality golf course and meet new friends and business associates!
Book A Tour Now
About Cypress Lake GC
Fort Myers #1 Golf Course
Cypress Lake is an 18-hole championship golf course designed by renowned architect Dick Wilson and renovated over our long history by architects Arthur Hills, Ron Garl and fully restored back to its original design by Ron Forse in 2018.
The club is not affiliated with any real estate nor located within a gated community. There are no pools, fitness centers, bocce ball, pickle ball and there is not a big social component outside of golf related events.
We have over 150 single digit handicaps with our strengths being the ability to get tee times, find a game and walk any time of day for no fee.
It's All About Golf, Golf & More Golf!!!
“If you are looking for premier playing conditions all year round without all the “fluff” then Cypress Lake is your home.”
New Members
Get on the list and don't miss out on golf at Cypress Lake
Waiting List
There is a current waiting list  so sign up now!
GET ON THE LIST NOW!
MORE ABOUT CYPRESS LAKE GOLF CLUB
Why Become A Member @ Cypress Lake G.C?
Quality Golf, Quality Facilities
& Quality Staff Are Waiting for You...
Why Join Cypress Lake?
It's Southwest Florida's Finest Golf Course!
A robust calendar of events that cater to the true passionate golfer regardless of skill level. These events are created to maximize your golf experience from start to finish giving a sense of community creating long lasting friendships along the way.
Excellent Facilities
Private, Member-Owned Club
Superior quality golf course
Six sets of tees to choose from.
High end practice facilities
Centrally Located
Top Notch Staff
State of the Art Practice Facilities
Ability to Walk the Course
Knowledgable Ground's Staff
Elite Instructional Program
Easy To Get A Game
Comments From Our Members @ Cypress Lake G.C?
Roger Sitkins
Insurance Motivational Coach
We've met great people and always look forward to playing golf with our friends... such a pleasure!
.commentor-content END
Rick Krichbaum
Wealth Management Advisor
I love the course, the members and the staff. Cypress is always in pristine condition and a pleasure to play...
.commentor-content END
Elizabeth McClymont
Web Developwer
It's a great place to play and the wildlife is fantastic. The greens are in tip-top condition - just a great place to be a member.
Love It!!
.commentor-content END
Gary Roth
Retired Insurance Consultant
Excellent practice facilities with a good choice of teachers. My game has improved tremendously since joining
.commentor-content END
James Reid
Retired Musician
So many nice people who are happy to take your money of you with a dodgy handicap:)
.commentor-content END
Paul Velte
Baseball Team Owner
I have played a many top notch courses over the years and Cypress Lake is right up there with  them
.commentor-content END
Steve Weisberg
Property Investment & Pilot
The course is always in excellent condition and the greens run true. Easily, the best course around...
.commentor-content END
